subject: New Quickscript Font - Junior.ttf
msgSnippet: In follow-up to my note this morning: I did some small modifications of the Jerome Font to remove the script like characteristics.  I removed the half letters
messageBody:
In follow-up to my note this morning:

I did some small modifications of the Jerome Font to remove the
script like characteristics. I removed the half letters and replaced
u with a. I also tried to keep it so that Shavian writers would have
little learning time. I added space between the letters so that it
is more like a type face.

Why? I believe that many of the modifications Read made to
quickscript works as a printed improvement to Shavian. This Junior
Quickscript is meant to incorporate all of those, without adding the
flourish and complication of the joined and half letters.

My hope is that this junior quickscript font may be more readable and
easier on some reader's eyes.

The only major change I made in the keyboard was to include the Wheat
character as cap W, as the cap W was no longer needed.

I am open to critique and suggestions on this experimental font. It
is uploaded as Junior.ttf in the files section.

Rick aka Flyfisher.

In follow-up to my note this morning:

I did some small modifications of the Jerome Font to remove the 
script like characteristics.  I removed the half letters and replaced 
u with a.  I also tried to keep it so that Shavian writers would have 
little learning time. I added space between the letters so that it 
is  more like a type face.  

Why?  I believe that many of the modifications Read made to 
quickscript works as a printed improvement to Shavian.  This Junior 
Quickscript is meant to incorporate all of those, without adding the 
flourish and complication of the joined and half letters.   

My hope is that this junior quickscript font may be more readable and 
easier on some reader's eyes. 

The only major change I made in the keyboard was to include the Wheat 
character as cap W, as the cap W was no longer needed.  

I am open to critique and suggestions on this experimental font.  It 
is uploaded as Junior.ttf in the files section.

Rick aka Flyfisher.
